TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BitmapPalettes extends System.Object
public ref class BitmapPalettes abstract sealed

summary.span: 定義點陣圖影像常用的數個色板。

span.span: Defines several color palettes that are commonly used by bitmap images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 廣域網路 」 其名稱結尾有額外的 [色彩]，屬性是完全透明的。 properties whose names end with "Transparent" have an additional "color" that is fully transparent. 如果已經有 256 色的調色盤，最後色彩取代為透明的色彩。In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color. 只有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]影像格式支援調色盤。Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] image formats support palettes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構新所使用的成員類別類似的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new by using a member of the class in a similar way. [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#10)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BlackAndWhite As BitmapPalette

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示黑白色板。

span.span: Gets a value that represents a black-and-white color palette.

summary.span: 這個調色盤共有 2 種色彩。

span.span: This palette consists of 2 colors total.
An instance of .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構新所使用的成員類別。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new by using a member of the class. 雖然這個範例示範如何使用屬性，您可以使用的任何成員類別類似的方式。Although this example shows how to use the property, you can use any member of the class in a similar way. span.span: Gets a value that represents a black, white, and transparent color palette.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Halftone256Transparent As BitmapPalette

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示含有 256 種主要色彩、16 種系統色彩以及 1 種額外透明色彩的色板，而這個額外透明色彩會取代該順序 (Sequence) 中的最終色彩。

span.span: Gets a value that represents a color palette that contains 256 primary colors, 16 system colors, and 1 additional transparent color that replaces the final color in the sequence.

summary.span: 調色盤中的重複色彩都已移除。

span.span: Duplicate colors in the palette are removed.

summary.span: 這個調色盤共有 256 種色彩。

span.span: There are a total of 256 colors in this palette.

span.span: Gets a value that represents a color palette that contains 27 primary colors and 16 system colors, with duplicate colors removed and 1 additional transparent color.

summary.span: 這個調色盤共有 36 種色彩。

span.span: There are a total of 36 colors in this palette.
An instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 「 廣域網路 」 其名稱結尾有額外的 [色彩]，屬性是完全透明的。 properties whose names end with "Transparent" have an additional "color" that is fully transparent. 如果已經有 256 色的調色盤，最後色彩取代為透明的色彩。In the case of palettes that already have 256 colors, the last color is replaced by the transparent color. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構新所使用的成員類別。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new by using a member of the class. 雖然這個範例示範如何使用屬性，您可以使用的任何成員類別類似的方式。Although this example shows how to use the property, you can use any member of the class in a similar way.
